description: This Two-Hit Fig Punch recipe combines fig's sweet and fruity taste with spiced rum,&nbsp;bourbon, and citrus fruit juices to make it delicious and aesthetically pleasing. Fresh figs create a simple syrup, while the spiced rum and whiskey provide the good alcohol we all love.
keywords: Two Hit Fig Punch Cocktail Recipe
How To Two Hit Fig Punch
name: Two Hit Fig Punch
recipeIngredient: 6 oz. Navel orange juice, freshly squeezed
Grated nutmeg and lime wheels for garnish

recipeInstructions.name: Combine the fresh figs with the simple syrup in a small bowl.
recipeInstructions.text: Combine the fresh figs with the simple syrup in a small bowl.

recipeInstructions.name: Combine the rest of the ingredients, along with the fig and simple syrup mixture, in a sufficiently sized punch bowl. Add ice.
recipeInstructions.text: Combine the rest of the ingredients, along with the fig and simple syrup mixture, in a sufficiently sized punch bowl. Add ice.

recipeInstructions.name: Garnish it with lime wheels and grated nutmeg
recipeInstructions.text: Garnish it with lime wheels and grated nutmeg
